name: hugo-site
description: This is the repository from which the Hugo-generated version of https://www.brycewray.com/ is built.
author: Bryce Wray

scripts.devdebug:hugo: pnpm run install:hugo && pnpm run devexecdebug:hugo
scripts.move-excerpts: move-cli public/posts/index.xml public/index-excerpts.xml && move-cli public/posts/index.json public/index-excerpts.json
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development pnpm run clean && pnpm run dev:hugo
scripts.start:debug: NODE_ENV=development pnpm run clean && pnpm run devdebug:hugo
scripts.build:prelim: NODE_ENV=production pnpm run clean && pnpm run prod:hugo
scripts.build: pnpm run build:prelim && pnpm run move-excerpts && pnpm run search
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run deploy:wrangler
scripts.testbuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:prelim && pnpm run move-excerpts && pnpm run testbuildexec:hugo
scripts.testbuildpf: pnpm run build:prelim && pnpm run move-excerpts && pnpm run testbuild:search && pnpm run testbuildexec:hugo
